tool_description: Use this Know-Your-Business Process (KYB) API to validate registered companies and business names recognised by the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC). You have enpoints to search, validate name availability and validate and fetch business and company registration numbers.
name: Business and company name API
title: Business and company name API

api_list.name: Search By Registration Number
api_list.description: Search company information by the company or business' registration number issued by the CAC. It returns a single match if the registration number exists.

api_list.name: Search Company By Name
api_list.description: Do you know the company name? you can make a search of company information with just the name. You will get hits of all companies and businesses that are matching that particular name.

api_list.name: Get All Companies (Paginated)
api_list.description: This endpoint gets all the companies and business as in the CAC database.
